title: Display M, Preample L
code:
<gds-flex max-width="800px" padding="5xl" flex-direction="column" align-items="center" gap="xl">
  <gds-text text-align="center " font="display-m">Climate change is the greatest and most urgent challenge.
  </gds-text>
  <gds-text max-width="800px" padding="0 2xl 0 2xl" color="neutral-02" text-align="center " font="preamble-l">We have
    committed to the Paris Agreement by the signing of the UNEP FI Principles for Responsible Banking, and one of the
    founding signatories of the Net-Zero Banking Alliance and the Net Zero Asset Managers initiative.
  </gds-text>
    <gds-badge variant="notice">XL (24)</gds-badge>
</gds-flex>
